# Pull Request

**Important:** If this PR adds a new feature, please ensure you've first pitched it in an issue and had it accepted before opening this PR.

## Description
Brief description of what this PR does.

Fixes # (issue number)

## Type of Change
- | ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Checklist
- [ ] **For new features:** I have opened an issue to discuss this feature and it was accepted
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- | ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- | ] All new and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly (if applicable)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

Describe how you tested your changes:

```bash
# Commands you ran to test
```

## Screenshots (if applicable)
Add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## Additional Notes
Any additional information that reviewers should know.
